name: Zeroing
description:
Nine squares, twenty four digits, one goal: Zero!

It's a challenging puzzle game that will sharpen your math and memory skills.  

Features:
✔ Endless puzzle 
✔ Easy, normal, hard and hardcore difficulty levels
✔ Buy and complete novelty items per difficulty levels
✔ Share score, collection and win streak to social media
✔ Compete with other players for the top spot in the leader board

It's a puzzle game were getting an 🥚 is your highest compliment! 😁
